text:
[Music] Hello I'm Rosemary Knight, a 
Professor in the Geophysics Department

at Stanford. Letting you know about 
a new online course now available,

Harnessing the Power of Geophysical Imaging 
to Recharge California's Groundwater.

This course accompanies the web-based 
app we have created, Fastpath,

that allows you to work with geophysical data, 
your data, or publicly available data to evaluate

potential sites for recharge. Specifically 
looking for fast paths from the ground surface

to the water table. Thus the name of our app, 
Fastpath. So join us and harness the power

of geophysical imaging to support the planning 
and implementation of managed aquifer recharge

throughout California. It's the way forward 
for sustainable groundwater management [Music].
